alert.note: Alert for Pryor, Northern Bighorn Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 05 at 1:44PM MDT until April 06 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Strongest winds expected through this evening. Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow combined with the strong winds will create near whiteout conditions at times, making back country activities and travel dangerous.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris, tree limbs, and downed power lines. Use caution if you must drive. Don`t cause a spark!
